mechanoreception.notes: Likely possess mechanoreception, including lateral line system, for detecting water movement, common in aquatic vertebrates.

chemoreception.notes: Likely possess chemoreception for detecting chemical cues in the water, aiding in prey detection and navigation.

electroreception.notes: Electroreception capabilities are not mentioned in the provided context and require further investigation.
